entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this evening. Rain or ice pellets this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 11.
entry.summary: Rain showers. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of drizzle. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of drizzle early in the evening. Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Thursday 20 April 2023
